title: Copenhagen holiday [edited version]
brief_description: A film whose feature is the Bing and Grohndahl Porcelain Potteries in Copenhagen. Shows the beautiful ceramic figures being made and hand-painted. The sung narration adds an unusual slant to the film. (Note this is an edited version of “Copenhagen holiday”, Title Code 002410).
